alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 11 at 12:26PM PST until January 12 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North winds of 10 to 20 mph will continue to decrease and become light in most areas. Temperatures as cold as 30 to 35 degrees in wind sheltered valleys will result in frost formation especially in grassy and mulch areas. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation and plants if left uncovered. Pets should be brought indoors. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy frost for Friday night and Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
